posts.title: create a ruby dsl: factory boy
posts.text: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667require 'active_support/core_ext/string'class User attr_accessor :name, :emailendmodule FactoryBoy @registry = {} def self.registry @registry end class Builder attr_reader :attributes def initialize @attributes = {} end def method_missing(name, *args, &block) @attributes[name] = args[0] end end class Definition def factory(name, &block) builder = Builder.new if block_given? builder.instance_eval(&block) end FactoryBoy.registry[name] = builder end end def self.define(&block) definition = Definition.new definition.instance_eval(&block) if block_given? end def self.build(name, overrides = {}) raise FactoryNotRegistry, "Factory haven't registry!" unless @registry.has_key?(name) instant = FactoryBoy.const_get(name.to_s.classify).new attrs = @registry[name].attributes.merge(overrides) attrs.each do |name, value| instant.send("#{name.to_s}=", value) end instant end class FactoryNotRegistry < StandardError; endendFactoryBoy.define do factory :user do name 'zhangsan' email 'zhangsan@gmail.com' endendp FactoryBoy.registry #=> {:user=>#<FactoryBoy::Builder:0x00000003237b40 @attributes={:name=>"zhangsan", :email=>"zhangsan@gmail.com"}>}p FactoryBoy.build(:user) #=> #<User:0x00000003237348 @name="zhangsan", @email="zhangsan@gmail.com">p FactoryBoy.build(:user, name: 'lisi', email: 'lisi@gmail.com') # => #<User:0x00000003236e48 @name="lisi", @email="lisi@gmail.com">p FactoryBoy.build(:other) #=> Factory haven't registry! (FactoryBoy::FactoryNotRegistry) 关键在于理解instant_eval 和 block的用法

posts.title: instant_eval和block的区别
posts.text: 1234567891011121314151617181920class Test attr_accessor :var def say_hello(&block) instance_eval(&block) end def say_hello2(&block) block.call endendTest.new.say_hello do p self #=> main @var = 100endTest.new.say_hello2 do p self #=> #<Test:0x00000002b1e200> @var = 100end 结论： block的作用域是main，instant_eval的作用域是instant本身
